content.query:
-- lanciare 3/4 volte
SELECT
    subcategory
    ,COUNT(*) AS num
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/parquet/year=2020/month=03/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GROUP BY subcategory
ORDER BY num DESC;

--------------------------------------------------------------------

SELECT DISTINCT
    subcategory
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakeytaletu.dfs.core.windows.net/sanfranciscofireworkersdata/sanfrancisco/parquet/year=2020/month=03/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result];
